title: COMPLETE PANDORA & DESPERTAR CEMENTERIO 4 - FOR SONY PSP
description:
PANDORA & DESPERTAR CEMENTERIO 4 - FOR SONY PSP


CREATE PANDORA SET TO INSTALL CUSTOM FIRMWARE M33 3.80 ON ANY PSP EVEN A BRICK !

NO OTHER FILES NEEDED, NO OFFICIAL UPDATE FILES, COMPLETE FILE SET INCLUDED.

MSIPL.BIN INCLUDED AND ALL FIRMWARE FILES NEEDED.

You will need a psp running custom firmware.

1)
Make sure you have nothing on the memstick you want to keep!
Now FORMAT the memstick with the PSPs function for doing so
from Systemconfig => Format MemStick
2)
Copy the contents of folder "pandora PSP memory stick files" from this archive to your memstick, 
and run pandora installer
3)
Press R+X, and confirm with R+L+X to repartition and format the memstick
(this is needed to reserve space for the MS IPL)
4)
Restart the PSP and connect it to the PC again via USB.
Again, copy the contents of folder "pandora PSP memory stick files" from this archive to your memstick
5)
run pandora installer again, press L+x to install MSIPL.BIN file to special sector on memory stick.
6)
Restart the pandora installer once again and press O to make your battery to a Pandora one, 
good idea to backup battery serial first !
7)
Remove battery and replace it, you now have a pandora magic memory stick and battery !

To change the battery to a normal battery, remove the battery, plug in the ac adaptor and turn on the psp. You can then reinsert the battery and run the pandora program to change the battery back to normal.
